text: Glamis Meadow and Wood is a 9.5 hectare Local Nature Reserve in Wellingborough in Northamptonshire. It is owned and managed by Borough of Wellingborough. A stream runs through this site, which has woodland and grassland. Facilities include a cycle path, seating and information boards. There is access from Hardwick Road and The Promenade. ==References== Category:Local Nature Reserves in Northamptonshire
title: Glamis Meadow and Wood
